Description:
Detects the use of rclone, a command-line program to manage files on cloud storage, via its default user-agent string

Author: Janantha Marasinghe
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Rclone Activity via Proxy
Query: eql select * from _source_ where c-useragent like 'rclone/v%'
